title: Sawmill wants to go home
acceptText: Hello, I am Sawmill! I live in this rocket because of reasons. That is why it is called ''Sawmill Express''. But I have a problem, I can not start the rocket because I fucked up the start button. It is on the outside... Can you help me press the button? It only works if you first kill five zombies AND build a sandcastle. Use the force, you're a wizard, Legolas! Now go!

title: The first one is free
acceptText: Hello Nollan! I am Rekoil, the Linux dealer here at IT. Here's a 1GB USB stick with the finest Arch Linux in town, ready to be injected. I want you to take it and go to Hubben, once there, I want you to install Arch Linux on all the computers you can find.
completionText: Thanks a lot! Here, be discrete... I don't want GUD to know I'm distributing lightweight distros around campus.

title: Galen processor
acceptText: När jag blir stor vill jag bli en galen processor

title: #NyaBjörn
acceptText: Hjälp mig att bli nya Björn

title: Farbror fishur
acceptText: Tjenare Nollan! Det är jag som är fishur, jag har ett uppdrag till dig, jag skulle vilja att du hämtar en kopp kaffe till mig. Om du gör det, så bjuder jag på ditt nästa häfv!
